Title: Walk the road of Dazhai
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: The rural village of Dazhai became a national example in agriculture. With hammer and chisel, peasants constructed terraces on the mountainsides, just by starting and persevering - and believing Mao's maxims. Dazhai leader Chen Yonggui, pictured here, became a model in his own right.
